title: Simulation-Based Drama Education Workshop for Training Sales Communication Skills

context.additional_context: Online role-play-centered training for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Explain at least three effective communication strategies with customers through simulation-based role-playing
Perform appropriate verbal/nonverbal responses with over 80% accuracy in scenarios replicating real sales situations using drama education principles
Reflectively analyze one's communication style and propose two improvement strategies through a structured debriefing process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
